products.name: Anson Durst, Rock of the Faith

characterabilities.name: Brace For Impact
characterabilities.description: This model is not moved when slammed.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Sturdy
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be pushed.

feat.name: Bastion Of Faith
feat.description: While in Anson Durst, Rock of the Faith's control range, warjacks in his battlegroup gain +4 ARM and Brace for Impact. When a friendly Faction warrior model in Durst's control range is directly hit by an attack while within 2" of a warjack in Durst's battlegroup, you can choose to have the warjack be directly hit instead. The warjack is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects from the attack. Bastion of Faith lasts for one round.

execution.name: Stone-and-Mortar Stance
execution.description: During its activation, this model can forfeit its Normal Movement or Combat Action to gain +5 ARM. The affected model cannot become knocked down. Stone-and-Mortar Stance lasts for one round.

ability.name: Eruption Of Ash
ability.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.description: Cleansing Fire causes fire damage. On a critical hit models suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Defender's Ward
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Hallowed Avenger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Cohort model gains Righteous Vengeance. (If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of a model with Righteous Vengeance during the last round, during your Maintenance Phase the model with Righteous Vengeance can advance up to 3" and make one basic attack.).

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Protectorate]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Protectorate model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Protectorate Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless].  Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Protectorate units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Protectorate Solos as well.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Flameguard]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Flameguard models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Whip the Flames
characterabilities.description: Models suffering the Fire continuous effect while in this model's control range suffer -2 to accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Scorched Earth
feat.description: Enemy models currently in Feora's control range suffer the Continuous Fire effect. Friendly warjack models can charge or power attack slam enemy models suffering the Continuous Fire effect without spending a focus point. Scorched Earth lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Ashen Veil
execution.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

spells.name: Dauntless Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +3 ARM and Tough.

spells.name: Engine Of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Fire Step
spells.description: Enemy models currently within 2" of the spellcaster suffer a POW 13 fire damage roll. After the damage is resolved, place the spellcaster completely within 2" of its current location. Fire Step can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Hex Hammer
spells.description: When an enemy model declares it is casting a spell while in this model's Control Range, the enemy spellcaster immediately suffers d3 damage points. If the enemy spellcaster is destroyed as a result of this damage, the spell does not take effect. Hex Hammer lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Incite
spells.description: Friendly Faction models gain +2 to attack and damage rolls against enemy models while the enemy models are in the spellcaster's command range. Incite lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Caustic Presence [Fire]
characterabilities.description: [tag1] continuous effects that affect enemy models in this model’s control range cannot expire.

characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Protectorate model. characterabilities.name: Righteous Flames
characterabilities.description: An enemy model that ends it's activation within 2" of this model suffers the Continuous Fire effect.

feat.name: Wildfire
feat.description: Feora gains 1 focus point for each enemy model currently in her control range suffering the Continuous Fire effect and can immediately give that focus to warjacks in her battlegroup that are in her control range. Feora can then remove the Continuous Fire effect from any number of models in her control range. For each Continuous Fire effect Feora removes, choose one model in her control range to suffer the Continuous Fire effect.

execution.name: Blazing Wrath
execution.description: A model with Blazing Wrath can charge enemy models suffering the Continuous Fire effect without spending focus.

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.description: Cleansing Fire causes fire damage. On a critical hit models suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.description: Gain an additional die on this spell's accuracy roll if the target is not affected by Continuous Fire. Ember Spark causes fire damage. Models hit suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spells.description: Enemy models currently within 2" of the spellcaster suffer a POW 13 fire damage roll. After the damage is resolved, place the spellcaster completely within 2" of its current location. Fire Step can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Firestarter
spells.description: Target a model in the spellcaster's battlegroup. That model's melee and ranged weapons gain Continuous fire.

feat.name: Clash of Flames

execution.name: Sacred Ward
execution.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spells.name: Road To War
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, Feora gains one anger token.

characterabilities.name: Imperishable Conviction
characterabilities.description: When a friendly Faction model in its Control Range is destroyed by an enemy attack, this model can remove 1 damage point.

characterabilities.name: Journeyman Warcaster
characterabilities.description: This model is not a warcaster or Leader, but has the following warcaster special rules: Battlegroup Controller, Focus Manipulation, Power Field, and Spellcaster. This model must have at least one warjack in its battlegroup at the start of the game.

spells.name: Immolation
spells.description: Immolation cases fire damage. On a critical hit, target model suffers the fire continuous effect.

spells.name: Mystic Wards
spells.description: Enemy animi and enemy upkeep spells on models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are in its control area immediately expire. While within 5" of a model in this model's battlegroup in its control area, enemy models cannot cast, channel, or upkeep spells. Mystic Wards lasts for one round.

spells.name: Road To War
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". A warjack can advance as a result of Road to War only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Ancient Shroud
characterabilities.description: When a damage roll against this model exceeds it's ARM, it suffers 1 damage point instead of the total rolled.

characterabilities.name: Man-Sized
characterabilities.description: This model is treated as a small-based model and occupies the space from the bottom of its base to a height of 1.75”.

characterabilities.name: Spell Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

subabilities.name: Flames of Wraith
subabilities.description: Choose a friendly Faction model/unit. For one round, while affected models are in this model’s command range, enemy models directly hit by their melee or ranged attacks suffer the Fire continuous effect.

subabilities.name: Lawgiver's Creed (★Action)
subabilities.description: For one round, enemy models cannot cast spells while in this model’s command range.

subabilities.name: Power of Faith (★Action)
subabilities.description: For one round, friendly Faction models cannot become knocked down or stationary while within 5" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Spell Ward

topability.name: Miracle Manifest
topability.description: This model may manifest the following Miracles. However, This model suffers 1 damage point each time it uses more then one of the following miracles at the rate of 1 damage per miracle beyond the first. This damage is suffered before the miracle takes effect.

subabilities.name: Fate of Heathens
subabilities.description: This model can use this miracle once per turn, at any time during its activation. This model’s Divine Wrath becomes ROF 2 and gains +4 RNG.

subabilities.name: Hands of Faith
subabilities.description: This model can use this miracle once per turn at any time during its activation. Remove d3 damage points from this model or another model within this model’s command range.

subabilities.name: Sanctuary Gate
subabilities.description: This model can use this miracle once per turn at the start of its activation. When this miracle is used, choose one other friendly Faction living warrior model within this model’s command range, Immediately Warp that model completely within 2” of this model.

subabilities.name: Wards of Faith
subabilities.description: This model can use this miracle once per turn at any time during its activation. For one round, friendly Faction warrior models within this model’s command range gain Mage Static.

ability.name: Admonisher
ability.description: When an enemy model is directly hit by an attack with this weapon, the d3 nearest enemy models within 4" of the model hit suffer an unboostable POW 10 Arcane Damage roll. These damage rolls are not considered to not have caused by an attack. Damage rolls resulting from Admonisher are simultaneous.

characterabilities.name: Iron Sentinel
characterabilities.description: While B2B with a friendly Faction warjack, this model gains +2 DEF and ARM and cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Repair [D3+1] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove D3+1 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Iron Sentinel
characterabilities.description: While B2B with a friendly Faction warjack, this model gains +2 DEF and ARM and cannot become knocked down.

topability.name: Magic Ability

subabilities.name: Arcane Bolt (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Arcane Bolt is a RNG 12, POW 11 Magic Attack.

subabilities.name: Empower (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in the range and it was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack also gains 1 focus point.

subabilities.name: Enliven (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the warjack is in range, the next time it suffers damage from an enemy attack while it is not advancing, immediately after the attack is resolved the warjack can make a full advance, hen Enliven expires. Enliven lasts for one round.

topability.name: Hymn
topability.description: When a model in this unit performs a Hymn special action, choose a hymn. Each activation, all models in this unit performing a hymn may choose different Hymns. A model can only be affected by one hymn at any time.

subabilities.name: Battle
subabilities.description: RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in range, it gains +2 to its damage rolls. Battle lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Passage
subabilities.description: RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in range, it cannot be targeted by non-magical ranged attacks. Passage lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Shielding
subabilities.description: RNG 3. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in range, it cannot be targeted by enemy spells. Shielding lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Anatomical Precision
characterabilities.description: When this model's melee damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of a living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point. A model disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough Roll.

characterabilities.name: Backstab
characterabilities.description: While completely within the back arc of an enemy model, this model gains an additional die on its accuracy and damage rolls against the model.

characterabilities.name: Reposition
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to [#tag1], then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Rocket Volley
characterabilities.description: If three or more models participate in a combined ranged attack, the size of the AOE is 4”, if five or more models participate, the size of the AOE is 5”. If seven or more models participate, the base POW of this attack’s AOEs is POW 10. If nine or more models participate, after determining the point of impact, roll deviation for an additional AOE.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

characterabilities.name: Man-Sized
characterabilities.description: This model is treated as a small-based model and occupies the space from the bottom of its base to a height of 1.75”.

characterabilities.name: Mobile Artillery
characterabilities.description: When this model advances as part of its Normal Movement, it gains +1” movement for each Grunt in this unit within 2” of it at the start of its advance.

characterabilities.name: Take Up
characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed, you can choose a trooper in this unit within 1” of it to be destroyed instead. Remove that trooper from the table instead of this model. This model has the same number of unmarked damage boxes as the chosen trooper.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

characterabilities.name: Defensive Strike
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy model advances into and ends its movement in this model’s melee range, this model can immediately make one basic melee attack against it.

characterabilities.name: Sanguine Bond
characterabilities.description: When this model would suffer damage from an enemy attack while in formation, you can choose one or more models in its unit to suffer any amount of that damage instead, divided as you choose. If you do, this mode does not suffer that damage. A model cannot suffer more damage as a result of Sanguine Bond then it has unmarked damaged boxes.

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Order: Shield Wall
characterabilities.description: Until the start of their next activation, each affected model’s shield grants an additional +2 ARM while B2B with another affected model in its unit. When receiving this order a model can forfeit its Combat Action to gain +3” movement as part of its Normal Movement this turn. This bonus does not apply to damage originating in the model's back arc. Models in this unit can begin the game affected by Shield Wall.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike

Models in this unit can begin the game affected by Shield Wall.

characterabilities.description: Models that received this order can participate in a combined ranged attack this activation. The unit commander must be the primary attacker. When resolving this attack, if there are 3 participants, the AOE of the unit commander's ranged weapon is 3”. If there are 5 participants, the AOE of the unit commander’s ranged weapon is 4”. If there are 7 participants the AOE of the unit commander’s ranged weapon is 5”. This AOE is a Dust Devil and a Hazard that remains in play for the rest of the round. Models entering or ending their activation in the AOE suffer the fire continuous effect unless they are Resistant: Fire.

characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Temple Flameguard unit.

characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Practiced Maneuvers.

This model may have up to 3 Power tokens at any time. This model can spend 1 power token to boost an accuracy or damage roll.

These damage rolls are not considered to not have caused by an attack. Damage rolls resulting from Admonisher are simultaneous.

characterabilities.description: Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. This model can carry up to 3 soul tokens at any time.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Well of Souls
characterabilities.description: This model begins the game with three soul tokens.

topability.name: Gatekeeper
topability.description: This model gains soul tokens from living friendly Faction models that are destroyed while in this model's CMD range. This model can spend soul tokens for the following:

subabilities.name: Path of Urcaen
subabilities.description: You can spend soul tokens on this model at any time during its activation to use Path of Urcaen For each soul token you spend, you can choose one friendly Faction model in this model’s command range to gain Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes.)

subabilities.name: Strength of Death
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action, this model can spend soul tokens to boost one accuracy or damage roll for each token spent.

subabilities.name: Vault of the Faithful
subabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, you can remove up to three soul tokens from this model to return one destroyed small- or medium-based friendly Faction Grunt to play for each token removed. Grunts return with one unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model’s CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in its unit. Grunts must forfeit either their normal movement or Combat Action the turn they are returned to play.

subabilities.name: Volume of Death
subabilities.description: During it's Combat Action, this model can spend soul tokens to make one additional ranged attack for each token spent.

ability.name: Jaws of Urcaen
ability.description: If this attack’s original target is an enemy model and that model is boxed by this attack, you can make a SP 6 attack using the boxed model as the attack’s point of origin. The SP 6 attack can target models in the boxed model’s back arc. Models hit suffer a POW 14 arcane damage roll. Models boxed by an attack with this weapon are removed from play.

ability.name: Rear Attack
ability.description: When declaring attacks with this weapon, this model can target models in it's back arc.

characterabilities.name: Circular Vision
characterabilities.description: Models never gain a back strike bonus against this model.

characterabilities.name: Distant Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be placed at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment, up to 12” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Fiery Blast
characterabilities.description: When this model is disabled, center a 5" AOE on it, then remove this model from play. Models in the AOE suffer a POW 14 fire damage roll.

characterabilities.name: Suffering’s Prayer
characterabilities.description: This model begins the game with 1 focus point. During your Control Phase, this model receives 1 focus point if it does not have any. This model cannot have more than 1 focus point at any time. While this model has a focus point, ranged attacks targeting it automatically miss. During a friendly Faction Warcaster’s activation, it can remove 1 focus point from this model in its control range and gain that focus point. Each warcaster can do this only once per turn. When a focus point is removed from this model, roll a d6. On a 1 or 2, this model explodes with the same effect as Fiery Blast and is removed from play.
